page.title: 11A day in my life
page.content: We go out of the halland go back to our classrooms where we do some work.We usually start by taking out our maths books.I sit next to James and Mark and so I work with them.At 10.25 we go out to play.We either play football or throwing.Occasionally we are allowed to play on the field.We only have twenty minutes for playtime and it goes very quickly.We continue with maths for about another ten minutes and then we finish.Next we get out our English books and continue with some aspect of English until dinnertime at 12 noon. At noon we go to the hall to eat our dinner.My friends and I all bring packed lunch for dinner.It only takes us a short time to eat our dinner and so we go out to play for the rest of the time.After what seems a short time it it time for the juniors to go in.
